abstract: The separate shareholder management teams for TNK and BP still cannot agree on what part, if any, their joint venture TNK-BP should play in Rosneft’s Arctic venture, reports Reuters.
snippet: The separate shareholder management teams for TNK and BP still cannot agree on what part, if any, their joint venture TNK-BP should play in Rosneft’s Arctic venture, reports Reuters.
lead_paragraph: The separate shareholder management teams for TNK and BP still cannot agree on what part, if any, their joint venture TNK-BP should play in Rosneft’s Arctic venture, reports Reuters.

headline.main: BP Joint Venture in Russia Mulls Rosneft Deal
